price: [Suleymaan] ni jedhe: “Dhugaa jetteefi warra sobdoota irraa taatee kee fuuldura ilaalla.
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
